segments.text: You will never guess where my family is going for summer vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me try . It has to be somewhere amazing , and far away ... Egypt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How in the world did you guess that ? Did someone tell you already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I overheard your mom and my mom talking in the grocery store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to ride a camel and definitely see the pyramids !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish our family took outrageous summer vacations like yours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It helps that my dad is an archaeologist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll get to go fishing at the river . I hate fish .
segments.speaker: S2
